about_the_game:
High Elo Girls is an esports visual novel about ambition, competition, and pursuing your dreams to become stronger. Experience the career of a newly minted professional player; from her initial trials, all the way to finally competing in a major tournament. Along the way you’ll confront themes of new adulthood, trust, rivalry and the challenges we face when we embrace the climb.

Featuring

  • A newcomer-friendly tour of the MOBA esports scene
  • 5 Team Roles to Play (Top Lane, Jungle, Mid Lane, DPS, and Support)
  • 5 Teammates to Befriend, Romance, or Antagonize
  • Choice-based MOBA Simulations featuring narrative-changing decisions

Embrace your dreams


You play as Rafaela, a college dropout with more regrets than qualifications. The only arena you have any shred of confidence left is also your only escape: the popular MOBA, Reckoners of Forsaken Lands.

But when you’re invited to join Momentum Gaming (MMG), you finally have the chance to prove to the world, what you’re really made of. But, the job demands not just your skill in Reckoners, but in negotiating relationships with your ambitious new teammates too. Can you rise to the challenge, or will this end up being just another squandered opportunity?

Navigate the competition


Engage in choice-based matches that impact Rafaela’s life in and out of her career. Are you a reliable follower closing the deal on your team’s plans; a showstopper making the daring plays that hit social media; or a wildcard who leaves nothing off the table?

Trust in your team...


Each of your five MMG teammates bring their own perspectives and goals with them. Building friendships, rivalries, and more, will be key to cementing your place in the team.

…Or break away on your own


For someone truly willing to stop at nothing to reach their goals, there may be other paths to discover, provided you’re able to stomach them.

Wishlist us today and look forward to future development updates!
✨ The Split Fate Team

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10
  • Processor: DirectX or OpenGL
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10 or Above
  • Processor: OpenGL 2 or DirectX 9
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

name: High Elo Girls

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1 GHz Intel or AMD Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows Vista or Above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2 or DirectX 9

short_description: High Elo Girls is a Visual Novel set in the esports scene where you play as the latest recruit for a new all-girls team. Can you help your squad achieve their true potential, or will you only squander your own?
